section.name: DBC_GLS_ICLI
section.code: *<<<< DBC_GLS_ICLI IF DBC-NUM-ICLI IN CFC-FLD > ZEROES MOVE DBC-NUM-ICLI IN CFC-FLD TO DBC-NUM-ICLI IN DBC MOVE DBC-IND-ICLI IN CFC-FLD TO DBC-IND-ICLI IN DBC MOVE DBC-GLS-ICLI IN CFC-FLD TO DBC-GLS-ICLI IN DBC MOVE 'DBC-IDC-ICLI' TO FIO-AKEY MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND PERFORM SGC-FIO-DBC IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'CLI NEX' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-NOMC IN CFC-FLD MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-GLS-ICLI ELSE MOVE DBC-CIC-ICLI IN DBC TO SCR-CIC-ICLI MOVE DBC-GLS-NOMC IN DBC TO CPT-STRN PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-GLS-NOMC IN CFC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: FIN_PUT_RPR_CFC
section.code: *BUS-TAB busca glosa de codigo en tabla IF RPR-IND-ESTA IN CFC-FLD > SPACES MOVE 'SGC' TO TAB-COD-SIST MOVE 'EST ' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB MOVE RPR-IND-ESTA IN CFC-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB PERFORM BUS-TAB MOVE TAB-GLS-DESC IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-ESTA IN CFC-FLD ELSE MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-ESTA IN CFC-FLD.

section.name: FIN_RPR_COD_TFRM
section.code: *<<<< IF RPR-COD-TFRM IN CFC-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-RPR-COD-TFRM. *VAL-COD Valida codigo de tabla MOVE 'SGC' TO TAB-COD-SIST. MOVE 'DRE' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE RPR-COD-TFRM IN CFC-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. PERFORM VAL-COD. IF MSG-COD-MENS = 'COD NEX' OR RPR-COD-TFRM IN CFC-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-LDOC IN CFC-FLD ELSE MOVE TAB-GLS-DESC IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-LDOC IN CFC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: FIN_RPR_IND_ESTA
section.code: *<<<< IF RPR-IND-ESTA IN CFC-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-RPR-IND-ESTA. *VAL-COD Valida codigo de tabla MOVE 'SGC' TO TAB-COD-SIST. MOVE 'EST' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE RPR-IND-ESTA IN CFC-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. PERFORM VAL-COD. IF MSG-COD-MENS = 'COD NEX' OR RPR-IND-ESTA IN CFC-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-ESTA IN CFC-FLD ELSE MOVE TAB-GLS-DESC IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-ESTA IN CFC-FLD. *>>>>
